casebody.data:
(New York Common Pleas

General Term,

April, 1893.)

Before Bisohoff and Pryor, JJ.

In re Application of the “ Lawyers’ Surety Co. of N. Y.” for an Order Respecting the Approval of Bonds and Undertakings, etc. Norwood & Coggeshall, for petitioner.

Petition authorizing the approval of bonds of the Lawyers’ Surety Co. of N. Y. granted.
